snippet.title: The Last Tinker: City of Colors - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: The first official trailer for Mimimi Production's epic platformer, The Last Tinker. Inspired by Zelda and Jak and Daxter, this glorious and colorful game will deliver platformer excitement to PC, Mac, Linux, and consoles in summer 2014. Published by Unity Games.
